entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Amos
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:10 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. High 6.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
